create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_EDITTITLEPROPERTIES ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @TITLECOLFIELD xml ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try --handle updating the data update tp SET tp.ISSPECIALTITLE = tc.ISSPECIAL, tp.ISMARITALTITLE = tc.ISMARITAL, tp.ISRELIGIOUSTITLE = tc.ISRELIGIOUS, tp.GENDER = tc.GENDER FROM dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES tp INNER JOIN ( SELECT TBL.COL.value('TITLECODEID[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') AS TITLECODEID, isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISSPECIAL[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISSPECIAL], isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISMARITAL[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISMARITAL], isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISRELIGIOUS[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISRELIGIOUS], isnull(TBL.COL.value('GENDER[1]', 'tinyint'), 0) AS [GENDER] FROM @TITLECOLFIELD.nodes('//TITLECOLFIELD/ITEM') Tbl(Col) ) tc ON tc.TITLECODEID = tp.ID
INSERT INTO dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES(ID, TITLECODEID, ISSPECIALTITLE, ISMARITALTITLE, ISRELIGIOUSTITLE, GENDER, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) SELECT tc.TITLECODEID, tc.TITLECODEID, tc.ISSPECIAL, tc.ISMARITAL, tc.ISRELIGIOUS, tc.GENDER, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE FROM ( SELECT TBL.COL.value('TITLECODEID[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') AS TITLECODEID, isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISSPECIAL[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISSPECIAL], isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISMARITAL[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISMARITAL], isnull(TBL.COL.value('ISRELIGIOUS[1]', 'bit'), 0) AS [ISRELIGIOUS], isnull(TBL.COL.value('GENDER[1]', 'tinyint'), 0) AS [GENDER] FROM @TITLECOLFIELD.nodes('//TITLECOLFIELD/ITEM') Tbl(Col) ) tc WHERE tc.TITLECODEID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
